left_knee_angle.description: Knee should be bent but not collapsed. 180=straight, lower=more bent.

right_knee_angle.description: Knee should be bent but not collapsed.

left_hip_angle.description: Hip flexion for athletic stance. Too low = folding at waist.

left_elbow_angle.description: Arms should not be overly bent/tense while surfing.

right_elbow_angle.description: Arms should not be overly bent/tense.

left_arm_raise.description: Arms raised for balance but not overhead. 0=arms at side, 180=overhead.

shoulder_tilt.description: Shoulders should be roughly level. 90=perfectly horizontal.

spinal_angle.description: Forward lean of torso from vertical. 0=upright, higher=more lean.

head_forward_offset.description: Head should be centered over shoulders, not jutting forward.

stance_width_ratio.description: Feet should be shoulder-to-hip width apart or slightly wider.
